ï»¿When visiting Seoul, the North Seoul Tower, also called Namsan Tower,...
...should be at the top of your list of attractions to check out.
The base of the tower is located on Mount Namsan.
You can get there from Namsan Park or by taking a cable car ride.
Mount Namsan is already the highest point in Seoul before you even go up the tower.
...you can see just how much this South Korean capital has grown over the years.
